00012 /* PWM prescaler, set PWM input clock to 15MHz, PWM_CLK = PCLK / PWM_PRESCALER */
00013 
00014 #if (PCLK == 15000000)
00015 #define PWM_PRESCALER   1
00016 #else
00017 
00018 #if (PCLK == 30000000)
00019 #define PWM_PRESCALER   2
00020 #else
00021 
00022 #if (PCLK == 60000000)
00023 #define PWM_PRESCALER   4
00024 #else
00025 
00026 #error unknown PCLK frequency
00027 #endif
00028 #endif
00029 #endif
